summary.purpose: Defines TypeScript interfaces for email-related data structures used by email_helpers.ts.
summary.problem_solved: Provides typed contracts for email attachments, email data payloads, and email configuration settings.

exports.name: EmailAttachment
exports.description_one_line: Represents a single email attachment with content, type, and filename.

exports.name: EmailData
exports.description_one_line: Represents the payload for sending an email (recipients, subject, body, attachments).

exports.name: EmailSettings
exports.description_one_line: Represents the SendGrid configuration settings stored in Firestore nx-settings.

symbols.name: EmailAttachment
symbols.description_one_line: Represents a single email attachment with content, type, and filename.

details.what_it_does: Defines the shape of an email attachment object compatible with the SendGrid API.

fields.name: filename
fields.description: The filename to display in the email client.

symbols.name: EmailData
symbols.description_one_line: Represents the payload for sending an email (recipients, subject, body, attachments).

details.what_it_does: Defines the shape of the email data object passed to send_email.

symbols.name: EmailSettings
symbols.description_one_line: Represents the SendGrid configuration settings stored in Firestore nx-settings.

details.what_it_does: Defines the shape of the email settings document retrieved from Firestore, containing the SendGrid API key and sender address.
